channel.title: Comments on: trying to make sense of it all The Slog, @JoeBlob20 , Mutual Aid and Why are we Here. Novak
channel.description: Exegesis Hermeneutics Flux Capacitor of Truthiness

item.title: By: rogerglewis
item.dc:creator: rogerglewis
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OMAIsqvTh7g https://twitter.com/PMotels/status/1143544027909959692 https://twitter.com/PMotels/status/1143543884598927360 aak June 24, 2019 at 3:36 pm Your tweet button does not work. It says “Page does not exist”. It has been like that for month John. Glitch or not it serves the purpose or has the effect whichever you prefer, of making it harder to share you with our Cyber networks. #COnquestofDough://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GgnClrx8N2k The comic science fiction writer Douglas Adams decided, by contrast, that the secret of the Universe was ’42’. Another famous Line from that classic So Long and thanks for all the fish. Well John Pleased to be Stuck in the middle with you and so very pleased to meet you. We Sloggers will certainly remember your Name.
item.content:encoded: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OMAIsqvTh7g https://twitter.com/PMotels/status/1143544027909959692 https://twitter.com/PMotels/status/1143543884598927360 aak June 24, 2019 at 3:36 pm Your tweet button does not work. It says “Page does not exist”. It has been like that for month John. Glitch or not it serves the purpose or has the effect whichever you prefer, of making it harder to share you with our Cyber networks. #COnquestofDough://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GgnClrx8N2k The comic science fiction writer Douglas Adams decided, by contrast, that the secret of the Universe was ’42’. Another famous Line from that classic So Long and thanks for all the fish. Well John Pleased to be Stuck in the middle with you and so very pleased to meet you. We Sloggers will certainly remember your Name.
